00041 RainbruRPG::Server::MainServerWindow::
00042 MainServerWindow(const QString &fileName, QWidget *parent)
00043                   : QMainWindow(parent)
00044 {
00045   LOGI("Creating MainWindow");
00046   clientList=NULL;
00047   running=false;
00048   server=new ServerThread();
00049 
00050   // Registrering metatype (needed for signal/slot argumenst)
00051   qRegisterMetaType<ENetAddress>("ENetAddress");
00052   qRegisterMetaType<tReceivedPacket>("tReceivedPacket");
00053 
00054   workspace=new QWorkspace();
00055   setCentralWidget(workspace);
00056 
00057   //Server Log
00058   serverLog=new ServerLog();
00059   workspace->addWindow(serverLog);
00060   serverLog->hide();
00061 
00062 
00063   setupActions();
00064 
00065   // Setting up status bar
00066   statusbar=new QStatusBar(this);
00067   setStatusBar(statusbar);
00068 
00069   stateLab=new QLabel("Started : No");
00070   clientsLab=new QLabel("Clients : 0");
00071 
00072   statusbar->showMessage("Ready");
00073   statusbar->addPermanentWidget(stateLab, 0);
00074   statusbar->addPermanentWidget(clientsLab, 0);
00075 
00076   // Loading the server configuration
00077   serverConfig=new ServerConfiguration();
00078   xmlServerConf xsc;
00079   xsc.load(serverConfig);
00080 
00081   connect(server, SIGNAL(clientConnected(const ENetAddress &)),
00082           this, SLOT(clientConnected(const ENetAddress &)));
00083   connect(server, SIGNAL(packetReceived(const tReceivedPacket&)),
00084           this, SLOT(packetReceived(const tReceivedPacket&)));
00085 
00086   LOGI("MainWindow created");
00087 }

00092 RainbruRPG::Server::MainServerWindow::~MainServerWindow(){
00093   delete workspace;
00094   delete serverConfig;
00095   delete stopAct;
00096   delete runAct;
00097   delete server;
00098   delete serverLog;
00099 
00100   if (clientList){
00101     delete clientList;
00102   }
00103 }

00108 void RainbruRPG::Server::MainServerWindow::setupActions(){
00109 
00110   // The Server/Configuration Action
00111   QAction* confAct = new QAction(tr("&Configuration"), this);
00112   confAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+C"));
00113   confAct->setStatusTip(tr("Server's configuration dialog"));
00114 
00115   // The Server/Technote Action
00116   QAction* techAct = new QAction(tr("&Technical note"), this);
00117   techAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+T"));
00118   techAct->setStatusTip(tr("Change the Server's technical note"));
00119 
00120 
00121   // The Server/Run Action
00122   runAct = new QAction(QIcon(":/images/start.png"), tr("&Run"), this);
00123   runAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+R"));
00124   runAct->setStatusTip(tr("Runs the server"));
00125 
00126   // The Server/Stop Action
00127   stopAct = new QAction(QIcon(":/images/stop.png"), 
00128                                  tr("&Stop"), this);
00129   stopAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+S"));
00130   stopAct->setStatusTip(tr("Stops the server"));
00131   stopAct->setEnabled(false);
00132 
00133   // The Server/Exit Action
00134   QAction* exitAct = new QAction(tr("&Exit"), this);
00135   exitAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+E"));
00136   exitAct->setStatusTip(tr("Exit"));
00137 
00138 
00139   // The Manage/clients Action
00140   QAction* clientsAct = new QAction(tr("&Clients"), this);
00141   clientsAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+I"));
00142   clientsAct->setStatusTip(tr("Manages the connected clients"));
00143 
00144   // The Manage/log Action
00145   QAction* logAct = new QAction(tr("&Log"), this);
00146   logAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+L"));
00147   logAct->setStatusTip(tr("Manages the server's log"));
00148 
00149 
00150 
00151   // The Help/about action
00152   QAction* aboutAct = new QAction(tr("&About"), this);
00153   aboutAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+A"));
00154   aboutAct->setStatusTip(tr("About RainbruRPG server"));
00155 
00156   // The Help/index action
00157   QAction* indexAct = new QAction(tr("&Index"), this);
00158   indexAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+I"));
00159   indexAct->setStatusTip(tr("Shows the manual index"));
00160 
00161   // The menus
00162   QMenu* serverMenu = menuBar()->addMenu(tr("&Server"));
00163   serverMenu->addAction(confAct);
00164   serverMenu->addAction(techAct);
00165   serverMenu->addSeparator();
00166   serverMenu->addAction(runAct);
00167   serverMenu->addAction(stopAct);
00168   serverMenu->addSeparator();
00169   serverMenu->addAction(exitAct);
00170 
00171   QMenu* manageMenu = menuBar()->addMenu(tr("&Manage"));
00172   manageMenu->addAction(clientsAct);
00173   manageMenu->addAction(logAct);
00174 
00175 
00176   QMenu* helpMenu = menuBar()->addMenu(tr("&Help"));
00177   helpMenu->addAction(aboutAct);
00178   helpMenu->addAction(indexAct);
00179 
00180 
00181   // The tool bar
00182   QToolBar* toolBar=this->addToolBar("toolbar");
00183   toolBar->insertAction( 0, runAct );
00184   toolBar->insertAction( 0, stopAct );
00185 
00186   connect(confAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(showConfigDialog()));
00187   connect(techAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(showTechNoteDialog()));
00188   connect(indexAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(showHelpDialog()));
00189   connect(indexAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(showHelpDialog()));
00190   connect(runAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(startServer()));
00191 
00192   connect(clientsAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(manageClients()));
00193   connect(logAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(showLog()));
00194 
00195   connect(stopAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(stopServer()));
00196   connect(exitAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(close()));
00197 
00198 }

00238 void RainbruRPG::Server::MainServerWindow::startServer(){
00239   LOGI("Starting server");
00240   if (!running){
00241     if (registerServer()){
00242       runAct->setEnabled(false);
00243       stopAct->setEnabled(true);
00244       stateLab->setText("Started : Yes");
00245       running=true;
00246 
00247       // Serverlog 
00248       QString msg="Server started";
00249       serverLog->addMessage(SLL_INFORMATIVE, msg);
00250 
00251       // Init enetHost
00252       server->setPort(serverConfig->getPort());
00253       server->setMaxClient(serverConfig->getMaxClient());
00254       server->createServer();
00255       server->start();
00256      }
00257   }
00258 }
00259 
00263 void RainbruRPG::Server::MainServerWindow::stopServer(){
00264   if (running){
00265     if (unregisterServer()){
00266       stateLab->setText("Started : No");
00267       runAct->setEnabled(true);
00268       stopAct->setEnabled(false);
00269       LOGI("Server correctly shutdown");
00270       running=false;
00271       server->terminate();
00272       server->cleanupServer();
00273       QString msg="Server stopped";
00274       serverLog->addMessage(SLL_INFORMATIVE, msg);
00275     }
00276   }
00277 }
00278 
00285 void RainbruRPG::Server::MainServerWindow::exitRequested(){
00286   LOGI("Exit requested");
00287   stopServer();
00288 }

00296 bool RainbruRPG::Server::MainServerWindow::registerServer(){
00297   LOGI("Registering server");
00298   bool ret=true;
00299 
00300   std::string txtPort=StringConv::getSingleton().itos(serverConfig->getPort());
00301   std::string txtMC=StringConv::getSingleton()
00302     .itos(serverConfig->getMaxClient());
00303 
00304   CurlServerAdd csa;
00305   csa.setName(serverConfig->getName());
00306   csa.setIpAddress(serverConfig->getIpAdress());
00307   csa.setPort(txtPort);
00308   csa.setMaxClients(txtMC);
00309   csa.setDescription(serverConfig->getDesc());
00310   csa.setTechNote(serverConfig->getTechNote());
00311 
00312   bool resp=csa.perform();
00313   if (!resp){
00314     LOGW("Failed to register server");
00315     LOGCATS("Error message : ");
00316     LOGCATS(csa.getCustomErrorMessage());
00317     LOGCAT();
00318     QMessageBox::critical ( this, "An error occured", 
00319         "An error occured during server registration", "OK" );
00320     ret=false;
00321   }
00322 
00323   return ret;
00324 }
00325 
00332 bool RainbruRPG::Server::MainServerWindow::unregisterServer(){
00333   LOGI("Unregistering server");
00334 
00335   bool ret=true;
00336 
00337   CurlServerDelete csd;
00338   csd.setName(serverConfig->getName());
00339 
00340   bool resp=csd.perform();
00341   if (!resp){
00342     LOGW("Failed to register server");
00343     LOGCATS("Error message : ");
00344     LOGCATS(csd.getCustomErrorMessage());
00345     LOGCAT();
00346     QMessageBox::critical ( this, "An error occured", 
00347         "An error occured during server unregistration", "OK" );
00348     ret=false;
00349   }
00350 
00351   return ret;
00352 }

00384 void RainbruRPG::Server::MainServerWindow::
00385 packetReceived(const tReceivedPacket& e){
00386   LOGI("A packet was received");
00387   LOGCATS("Packet length : ");
00388   LOGCATI(e.dataLength);
00389 
00390   std::string c((const char*)e.data);
00391   LOGCATS(" Packet data : ");
00392   LOGCATS(c.c_str());
00393 
00394   // Try to get the NetBasePacket id
00395   NetPacketBase npb;
00396   npb.setData(e.data, e.dataLength);
00397   tNetPacketIdentifier i=npb.getIdentifier();
00398   LOGCATS(" Packet type : ");
00399   LOGCATS(npb.typeToString(i));
00400   LOGCAT();
00401 
00402   if (i==NPI_GEN_IDENT){
00403     npIdentification npi;
00404     npi.setData(e.data, e.dataLength);
00405     npi.netDeserialize();
00406 
00407     tNetworkClientType clientType=npi.getClientType();
00408     const char* typeString=npi.clientTypeToString(clientType);
00409     LOGCATS("Client type :");
00410     LOGCATS(typeString);
00411     LOGCAT();
00412 
00413     QString msg="A ";
00414     msg+=typeString;
00415     msg+=" client is requesting a connection :";
00416 
00417     tServerLogLevel msgType;
00418 
00419     // Prepare the connection response
00420     bool clientAccepted=isClientAccepted(clientType);
00421 
00422     npConnectionResponse ncr;
00423 
00424     if (clientAccepted){
00425       msg+=" Accepted";
00426       msgType=SLL_INFORMATIVE;
00427       ncr.setResponse(NCR_ACCEPTED);
00428     }
00429     else{
00430       msg+=" Refused";
00431       msgType=SLL_WARNING;
00432       ncr.setResponse(NCR_REFUSED);
00433     }
00434 
00435     // Creates the clientList if it doesn't exist
00436     if (!clientList){
00437       clientList=new ClientList();
00438     }
00439     clientList->addClient(e.host, e.port, clientType, clientAccepted);
00440     serverLog->addMessage(msgType, msg);
00441 
00442     server->getServer()->sendPacket(e.peer, &ncr);
00443   }
00444 }
00445 
00453 bool RainbruRPG::Server::MainServerWindow::
00454 isClientAccepted(tNetworkClientType t){
00455   bool ret=false;
00456 
00457   if (t==NCT_FLOODER){
00458     ret=serverConfig->getFloodMode();
00459   }
00460   else if (t==NCT_EDITOR){
00461     ret=serverConfig->getEditMode();
00462 
00463   }
00464   else if (t==NCT_GAME){
00465     ret=serverConfig->getPlayMode();
00466 
00467   }
00468 
00469   return ret;
00470 }
